items.sentence: I walk my little sister to school every morning.
I would've done it for you if you'd asked me to.
I saw Tom crossing the bridge about an hour ago.
Tom worked as a French teacher for thirty years.
I can't see any reason why we shouldn't do that.
I don't care much whether you believe me or not.
There are a lot of pretty flowers in the garden.
It would be better for me to tell you the truth.
You don't care about that kind of thing, do you?
Is there a difference between magic and sorcery?
